          <title>
            <string language="hu">Savas esők kialakulása</string>
            <string language="en">Emergence of acid rains</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hervortreten der saurer Regen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Apparition des pluies acides</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Emergence de chuvas ácidas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Emersione delle pioggie acide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εμφάνιση των όξινων βροχών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aparición de lluvias ácidas</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A savas esők kialakulását szemléltető ábra</string>
            <string language="en">Drawing illustrating the emergence of acid rains</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">savas esők,  levegőszennyezés,  légszennyezés,  környezetszennyezés,  </string>
            <string language="en">acid rains, air pollution, atmospheric pollution, environmental pollution</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichnen, das Hervortreten der saurer Regen 
veranschaulichend</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dessin illustrant l'apparition des pluies acides</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desenhar ilustrando o emergence de chuvas 
ácidas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dissipare illustrando l'emersione delle pioggie 
acide</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχεδιασμός επεξηγώντας την εμφάνιση των όξινων βροχών</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El trazar ilustrando la aparición de lluvias 
ácidas</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">saure Regen, Luftverschmutzung, atmosphärische 
Verunreinigung, Klimaverunreinigung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pluies acides, pollution atmosphérique, pollution 
atmosphérique, pollution environnementale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">chuvas ácidas, poluição de ar, poluição 
atmosférica, poluição ambiental</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pioggie acide, inquinamento atmosferico, inquinamento 
atmosferico, inquinamento ambientale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">όξινες βροχές, ατμοσφαιρική ρύπανση, ατμοσφαιρική ρύπανση,
περιβαλλοντική ρύπανση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">lluvias ácidas, contaminación atmosférica, 
contaminación atmosférica, contaminación ambiental</string>
